types.Help: Advance to the occupation named as 'border_square'. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the occupation chosen by the player. Player enters immediately.
Advance to the border square named as 'border_square'. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Advance to any border square chosen by the player. Subsequent player action depends on the landing square.
Non-movement player action. There are three action types: action:extra_turn, action:leave_unemployment, action:collect_experience.
Advance to the nearest Amtrak station and roll again.
Advance to the nearest Opportunity space and roll again.

Get out of Unemployment free<p/>Play this card to immediately leave Unemployment.
May save or sell.

SPECIAL OPPORTUNITY to Get an Extra Turn
Play at the start of your turn
